phrase_text_1: Books are the ships of thoughts, wandering through the waves of time.
phrase_text_2: A book is a noble teacher, the main source of knowledge and spiritual growth.
phrase_text_3: If you enter diligently into the books of wisdom, then you shall discover great benefit for your soul.
phrase_text_4: Books delight us through and through, they converse with us, they give us good advice; they become living and lively companions to us .
phrase_text_5: All that I know about my life, it seems, I have learned in books.
phrase_text_6: The only way to become a 'cultured' person - is by reading.
phrase_text_7: Conversation would be vastly improved by the constant use of four simple words: I do not know.
phrase_text_8: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.
phrase_text_9: Logic is the god of those who think.
phrase_text_10: What we know is not much. What we do not know is immense
